name: Unexist_Escape Game_Demo
description:
This is an Escape Game which I made for the school portfolio assignment.

The first-person controller in this game is using "First Person Exploration Kit".

and the light baking part is using "Bakery - GPU Lightmapper."

 ===== About Game Control ===== 

Move Keys: 

Using WASD to move the character. 

Push Shift to Run, Push Space to Jump.

Mouse: 

Right-Click = Zoom in

Left-Click = Interactive with objects.
